paragraphs.paragraph-1: Front-End Developer since 2012, with experience in React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, Tailwind CSS, Styled Components, Git and Jest. I have experience working in agile environments, using Scrum, facilitating ceremonies and contributing to the organization and documentation of the project. I've worked in marketing for more than 10 years, where I acquired a great deal of knowledge in search engine optimization (SEO) and content management systems (CMS) such as WordPress and Strapi.
paragraphs.paragraph-2: Throughout my career I also took on tasks in related areas, where I acquired knowledge in:

design.title: Design
design.summary: Layout creation, image manipulation, use of tools like Figma, Photoshop and Illustrator. Knowledge of UX/UI.

seo.title: SEO
seo.summary: Technical SEO, code optimization, headers and directives configuration, sitemap creation and use of tools like Semrush, Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics and Google Search Console.

devops.title: DevOps
devops.summary: CI/CD, Git and Git Flow, standardization of settings, definition of environments, sense of urgency, adaptability and teamwork.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure
infrastructure.summary: Configuration of Linux servers (Debian/Ubuntu), configuration of web servers such as Apache and Nginx, creation of virtual machines and databases on Google Cloud, installation of various components, SSH connection configuration, firewall adjustment and opening of ports and configuration of SSL certificates.
